channel.title: [FoL Class Idea] The Wanderer
channel.description:
>## [color=green]The Wanderer[/color] >**[color=lightgrey]Neutral Offensive[/color]** **Resolve (Passive)** - You are immune to occupation and target changing. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - You may step up as king. **Never Surrender (Day)** - Tonight, you will be immune to death and your **Brawl** ability will bypass occupy immunity. - 2 uses **Royal Connections (Day)** - Type a message. At the start of the night, the current king and any royal blood will receive it. **Brawl (Night)** - Occupy a player. Anyone who visits this player at night will also be occupied. - Infinite Uses **Spot Weakness (Night)** - Remove a player's death immunity for tonight and the following night. Anyone who tries to guard or heal the target will be occupied. - 1 Use _Your objective is to survive to see yourself become king._
>**Convert Immune**
>## [color=gold] The Victorious King[/color] >**[color=lightgrey]Neutral Special[/color]** **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a new king may arise. **The Royal Finger (Day)** - Your vote for today counts as 2 votes **Decide Fate (Day)** - You may change the result of a trial - 1 Use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player, they will not die tonight (Includes you) - 3 Uses **King's Favor (Night)** - Targeted player becomes your champion. Tomorrow, your champion cannot be accused of treason. - 2 Uses. *You have won! You may do as you please.*
>**Crowned From** >* The Wanderer
This is mainly a suggestion for FoL but I could see it working for ToL too (Just replace Victorious King with a Neutral King who has already won.)
I wasn't too sure about what to do for **King's Favor**, I wanted it to be something impactful and fun to use.
I'd like to hear all of your thoughts and suggestions. Too Strong? Too Weak? Unfun? Unfair?

item.title: [FoL Class Idea] The Wanderer
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
The Wanderer

Neutral Offensive
Resolve (Passive) - You are immune to occupation and target changing.
Royal Blood (Passive) - You may step up as king.
Never Surrender (Day) - Tonight, you will be immune to death and your Brawl ability will bypass occupy immunity. - 2 uses
Royal Connections (Day) - Type a message. At the start of the night, the current king and any royal blood will receive it.
Brawl (Night) - Occupy a player. Anyone who visits this player at night will also be occupied. - Infinite Uses
Spot Weakness (Night) - Remove a player’s death immunity for tonight and the following night. Anyone who tries to guard or heal the target will be occupied. - 1 Use
Your objective is to survive to see yourself become king.

Convert Immune

The Victorious King

Neutral Special
Pass the Torch (Passive) - If you die, a new king may arise.
The Royal Finger (Day) - Your vote for today counts as 2 votes
Decide Fate (Day) - You may change the result of a trial - 1 Use
Guard! (Night) - Choose a player, they will not die tonight (Includes you) - 3 Uses
King’s Favor (Night) - Targeted player becomes your champion. Tomorrow, your champion cannot be accused of treason. - 2 Uses.
You have won! You may do as you please.

Crowned From

  • The Wanderer

This is mainly a suggestion for FoL but I could see it working for ToL too (Just replace Victorious King with a Neutral King who has already won.)

I wasn’t too sure about what to do for King’s Favor, I wanted it to be something impactful and fun to use.

I’d like to hear all of your thoughts and suggestions. Too Strong? Too Weak? Unfun? Unfair?
